html: Eddie's "Believe Me" Tour returns to the U.S. in less than a month. Tickets: https://eddieizzard.com/en/shows  This intimate, funny, and emotional show reveals the man behind the stand-up with all of the fascination that fans expect from an Eddie Izzard performance. -The Beekeeperspic.twitter.com/tGMBRd4TXO
text:
Eddie's "Believe Me" Tour returns to the U.S. in less than a month.

Tickets: https://eddieizzard.com/en/shows 

This intimate, funny, and emotional show reveals the man behind the stand-up with all of the fascination that fans expect from an Eddie Izzard performance.   -The Beekeeperspic.twitter.com/tGMBRd4TXO

html: Great to speak at #Labourlive today about the politics of hope and meet so many fantastic Labour activists and supporters. Politics is a bit dry and it can be complex at times. We have to try new things and think outside the box if we’re to engage and enthuse.pic.twitter.com/ekZLOboTO4

html: Labour Party people - me again, Eddie Izzard! I have my first NEC meeting next week. Let me know in the comments below what issues you’d like me to raise at the meeting. Or you can email me at eddie@eddiefornec.compic.twitter.com/iHYjxnOxOj

html: Hi Berlin! After 24 shows in German, for one night only, I am going to perform my Work in Progress show in English! Get your tickets here - https://bit.ly/2ImbFsb pic.twitter.com/yoOOCOf7in
text: Hi Berlin!  After 24 shows in German, for one night only, I am going to perform my Work in Progress show in English!  Get your tickets here - https://bit.ly/2ImbFsb pic.twitter.com/yoOOCOf7in
